title: A person to watch over us

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Watch over a player at night, if they would die that night, you will instead speak to their attacker in a private channel, they will be notified you are 760. The attacker may rescind their attack, or continue.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Your ability cannot be stolen, removed, or otherwise prevented, this bypasses jail.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See one life spared by your cause.
